creator: eFolix SARL
descriptionHtml:
MC App is a stock management solution that has been designed to meet the needs of suppliers, wholesalers, and brands.
Our field experience has given rise to a management tool perfectly adapted to fashion professionals, it supports wholesalers and suppliers in their stock management, order taking and customer relations.

Optimize your sales with the sales solution, advanced sales representative management, and remote sales. Indeed your customers, shop managers, e-commerce site buyers or semi-wholesalers can visit your warehouse to make purchases and stock supply but with MC App they have the possibility to buy and stock themselves through distance selling.
Thanks to MC App and the MC application managing it, you have complete management of your articles, your customers' stocks but also your cash flow
MC app is a portable management software that makes it easy for you to manage your business.

MC Manager is intended for the manager for the complete management of the business. It is the stock management application that manages your company's back office: product management, stock management, and inventory management, as well as sales representatives and customer relations management. In addition, MC Manager provides a detailed overview of physical and remote sales order intake.
It also has the possibility of managing cash flow and anticipating supplies.

The advantage of MC Manager, management software is to optimize your business. The challenge for any manager is to find the right balance between stock supply and stock rotation. With MC Manager you have the possibility to follow the evolution of stocks in real-time, to follow the accounting, to analyze by articles the sales performance and to see the purchases by the customer.

MC Manager is THE management software that also masters the other MC App applications. Thus MC Manager manages the access rights of these sellers, sales representatives, and sales representatives. With MC Manager you analyze the sales history and performance of your salespeople. Each sale is integrated into the MC Manager software, and you can carefully track each customer: purchase preference, frequency of visits and financial status in your books.
Monitoring and analysis of sales performance are important to set new objectives.

In addition, you can manage the turnover of your salespeople, sales representatives and sales representatives with greater peace of mind. Sales history and customer data are only accessible to your salespeople by the right of access thanks to MC Manager.

Finally, you are constantly informed of cash flows. Because controlling your cash flow means above all anticipating expenses and receipts.

MC Manager accompanies you throughout your commercial career and guarantees you control and clean and professional management of your business.

MC App is a complete management software: products, stock, inventories, physical sales, remote sales, treasury, procurement, and customers are centralized in this portable solution accessible to all.

MC App offers one application per business line:
MC Seller is the application for sales. Your salespeople, salespeople, sales representatives can easily place an order and close a sale at any time and in any place. Stocks are synchronized in real-time: orders are placed with complete peace of mind.

MS Manager, the application for managing your online store for your distribution network. Customer relationship management, customer access to your online store and online order taking. You also manage the layout and display of your online store's items.

MicroStore is your online store for your distribution network. Online sales solution that facilitates the replenishment and purchase of your customers, store managers. With better visibility of your products and simplified inventory management from MC App: your distance selling process is made easier.

All these applications are interconnected and synchronized in real-time, know more in mc.app

title: MC Gérant

creator: eFolix SARL
descriptionHtml:
MC App is a stock management solution that has been designed to meet the needs of suppliers, wholesalers, and brands.
Our field experience has given rise to a management tool perfectly adapted to fashion professionals, it supports wholesalers and suppliers in their stock management, order taking and customer relations.

Optimize your sales with the sales solution, advanced sales representative management, and remote sales. Indeed your customers, shop managers, e-commerce site buyers or semi-wholesalers can visit your warehouse to make purchases and stock supply but with MC App they have the possibility to buy and stock themselves through distance selling.
Thanks to MC App and the MC application managing it, you have complete management of your articles, your customers' stocks but also your cash flow
MC app is a portable management software that makes it easy for you to manage your business.

MC Manager is intended for the manager for the complete management of the business. It is the stock management application that manages your company's back office: product management, stock management, and inventory management, as well as sales representatives and customer relations management. In addition, MC Manager provides a detailed overview of physical and remote sales order intake.
It also has the possibility of managing cash flow and anticipating supplies.

The advantage of MC Manager, management software is to optimize your business. The challenge for any manager is to find the right balance between stock supply and stock rotation. With MC Manager you have the possibility to follow the evolution of stocks in real-time, to follow the accounting, to analyze by articles the sales performance and to see the purchases by the customer.

MC Manager is THE management software that also masters the other MC App applications. Thus MC Manager manages the access rights of these sellers, sales representatives, and sales representatives. With MC Manager you analyze the sales history and performance of your salespeople. Each sale is integrated into the MC Manager software, and you can carefully track each customer: purchase preference, frequency of visits and financial status in your books.
Monitoring and analysis of sales performance are important to set new objectives.

In addition, you can manage the turnover of your salespeople, sales representatives and sales representatives with greater peace of mind. Sales history and customer data are only accessible to your salespeople by the right of access thanks to MC Manager.

Finally, you are constantly informed of cash flows. Because controlling your cash flow means above all anticipating expenses and receipts.

MC Manager accompanies you throughout your commercial career and guarantees you control and clean and professional management of your business.

MC App is a complete management software: products, stock, inventories, physical sales, remote sales, treasury, procurement, and customers are centralized in this portable solution accessible to all.

MC App offers one application per business line:
MC Seller is the application for sales. Your salespeople, salespeople, sales representatives can easily place an order and close a sale at any time and in any place. Stocks are synchronized in real-time: orders are placed with complete peace of mind.

MS Manager, the application for managing your online store for your distribution network. Customer relationship management, customer access to your online store and online order taking. You also manage the layout and display of your online store's items.

MicroStore is your online store for your distribution network. Online sales solution that facilitates the replenishment and purchase of your customers, store managers. With better visibility of your products and simplified inventory management from MC App: your distance selling process is made easier.

All these applications are interconnected and synchronized in real-time, know more in mc.app

- You can view transfer order statistics for individual products.

- You can limit the minimum sales price.

title: MC Gérant

creator: eFolix SARL
descriptionHtml:
PRESENTATION OF MC BOSS

MC Boss is intended for the wholesale manager for the complete management of his business. It is the stock management application that manages products, stock and inventories, VRPs and remote sales.
It also offers the possibility of managing cash flow and anticipating supplies.


FEATURES OF MC BOSS

- Stock management:
The advantage of MC Boss, management software, is to optimize your business while:
monitoring stock management in real time
monitoring accounting
analyzing sales performance
determining purchases per customer

- Stock:
The challenge for every fashion wholesaler is to find the right balance between stock supply and stock rotation:
by monitoring the stock evolution in real time
filtering out non-inventoried items in each inventory
by consulting the stock transfer history of items
by copying and/or recopying an item
by creating a minimum selling price
analyzing sales performance by item

- The customer:
you can follow each customer: his buying preferences, his frequency of visits and his financial status.

you have the possibility to activate/deactivate a customer
each sale is integrated in the MC Boss software

- Performance analysis :
MC Boss is THE management software for fashion wholesalers:
it also controls our other MC APP applications: MC Seller, MS Manager and Microstore
it manages the access permissions of salesmen, sales representatives and sales staff
it allows you to analyse the sales history and performance of your salespeople


- Turnover of salespeople, VRPs and sales representatives:
manage the turnover of your salespeople, VRPs and sales representatives in a more balanced way.
Give access to sales history and customer data to your salespeople by access rights
Collection permission is facilitated with 6 possible scenarios.

- Treasury
Constantly informed of cash flow. Indeed, controlling your cash flow means above all anticipating expenses and receipts.

- Purchasing and customer supply
MC Boss allows you
to have visibility on your customers' purchases and supplies from a distance.
to have the possibility of viewing all the documents linked to the sale,
to print or modify without any difficulty
to anticipate your stocks as a fashion wholesaler, through better stock management
to diversify your items to offer clothing and/or trendy items

MC Boss accompanies you throughout your commercial journey and guarantees you a CLEAN and PROFESSIONAL management of your business.

IN SUMMARY

MC APP offers an application tailored to the needs of all fashion professionals. Here are our other MC APP applications:

- MC Seller: This is the application for sales. Your salesmen, saleswomen and sales representatives can easily place an order and close a sale at any time and from any place. Stocks are synchronized in real time: orders can be taken with complete peace of mind.

- MS Manager: This is the management application for your online shop, for your distribution network. Features include customer relationship management, customer access to your online shop and online order taking. You also manage the layout and display of your online shop items.

- MicroStore is your online shop for your fashion wholesale distribution network. In short, it is an online sales solution that makes it easy for your customers and shop managers to replenish and purchase.
descriptionShort: This app digitalizes and facilitates the stock management of a wholesaler.

IN SUMMARY

MC APP offers an application tailored to the needs of all fashion professionals. Here are our other MC APP applications:

- MC Seller: This is the application for sales. Your salesmen, saleswomen and sales representatives can easily place an order and close a sale at any time and from any place. Stocks are synchronized in real time: orders can be taken with complete peace of mind.

- MS Manager: This is the management application for your online shop, for your distribution network. Features include customer relationship management, customer access to your online shop and online order taking. You also manage the layout and display of your online shop items.

- MicroStore is your online shop for your fashion wholesale distribution network. In short, it is an online sales solution that makes it easy for your customers and shop managers to replenish and purchase.
descriptionShort: This app digitalizes and facilitates the stock management of a wholesaler.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
-What's New:




- You can view transfer order statistics for individual products.

- You can copy specific product and create new products quickly.

- You can deactivate specific customers.

- You can limit the minimum sales price.

- You can set permissions to modify remarks on documents.

- You can restrict seller’s account for order cashier.

title: MC Boss - Stock management

descriptionHtml:

MC Boss is intended for the wholesale manager for the complete management of his business. It is the stock management application that manages products, stock and inventories, VRPs and remote sales.
It also offers the possibility of managing cash flow and anticipating supplies.


FEATURES OF MC BOSS

- Stock management:
The advantage of MC Boss, management software, is to optimize your business while:
monitoring stock management in real time
monitoring accounting
analyzing sales performance
determining purchases per customer

- Stock:
The challenge for every fashion wholesaler is to find the right balance between stock supply and stock rotation:
by monitoring the stock evolution in real time
filtering out non-inventoried items in each inventory
by consulting the stock transfer history of items
by copying and/or recopying an item
by creating a minimum selling price
analyzing sales performance by item

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Add permission for MS Manager to view customer arrears.
2. Show the MS Manager account that confirmed the order in the Micro Store order details
3. Automatically display the total amount subtracting expenses in the payment record statistics
4. Add the total quantity of products sold to the document list page
5. Add sorting option on customer list (debt + unpaid days)
6. Support deactivation of suppliers
